title: How to Get Waterfall in Pok√©mon X and Y

steps.title: Get to the point of the game where you've beaten the Anistar City gym and visited Couriway Town.
steps.content: Get to the point of the game where you've beaten the Anistar City gym and visited Couriway Town.

steps.title: Go to Route 19.
steps.content: Go to Route 19. It's located south of Couriway Town.

steps.title: Go to the bridge on that route.
steps.content: Go to the bridge on that route. You'll be challenged by Shauna, Tierno, and Trevor in succession.

steps.title: Beat them, and Shauna will give you Waterfall.
steps.content: Beat them, and Shauna will give you Waterfall.
